data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Alaves have been awarded a penalty in Madrid...
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 5, Lucas Perez smashes in a penalty at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. The score is now 0-1.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Alaves.
In the minute 14, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid's Toni Kroos is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Real Madrid at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 18, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) gets a yellow card.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Alaves.
Can Alaves capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Adrian Cordero Vega awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Real Madrid pushes forward through Eden Hazard, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 23, Alaves have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Free kick Real Madrid.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 24, Alaves's Lucas Perez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
Rodrygo is replacing Eden Hazard for the home team.
In the minute 30, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Free kick in a good position for Real Madrid!
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 35, Alaves have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Casemiro of Real Madrid gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Madrid.
In the minute 40, Mariano Diaz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Real Madrid.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Alaves have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Real Madrid are pushing forward but Mariano Diaz's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Real Madrid.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In Madrid, Alaves push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 48, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Goal! Alaves extend their lead to 0-2 through Joselu.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Alaves a goal kick.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Alaves.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 57, In Madrid Real Madrid attack through Toni Kroos. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Alaves's half.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
In the minute 60, Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Adrian Cordero Vega signals a throw-in for Real Madrid, close to Alaves's area.
Zinedine Zidane (Real Madrid) is making a second substitution, with Vinicius Junior replacing Marco Asensio.
Lucas Perez of Alaves smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 64, Free kick Real Madrid.
Alaves needs to be cautious. Real Madrid have an attacking throw-in.
Alaves will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Real Madrid.
In the minute 65, Nacho for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Alaves.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Luis Rioja (Alaves) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 69, Alaves's Joselu breaks free at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Adrian Cordero Vega awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a Alaves throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
The home team replace Luka Modric with Martin Odegaard.
In the minute 70, Zinedine Zidane is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano with Ferland Mendy replacing Marcelo.
Isco is on a sub for Toni Kroos for Real Madrid.
In the minute 73, Real Madrid's Rodrygo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Real Madrid's Isco gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Ruben Duarte is booked for the away team.
In the minute 77, Alaves make their first substitution with Edgar Mendez replacing Tomas Pina.
Mariano Diaz of Real Madrid is pulled up for offside.
Real Madrid are coming forward and Isco gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Madrid just outside Alaves's area.
In the minute 81, Real Madrid's Casemiro is whistled for offside at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Can Real Madrid capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 86, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Adrian Cordero Vega.
Goal! Casemiro pulls one back to make it 1-2.
Real Madrid have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 88, Edgar Mendez (Alaves) gets a yellow card.
Javi Lopez is replacing Luis Rioja for Alaves at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
The away team have replaced Lucas Perez with Borja Sainz. This is the third substitution made today by Pablo Machin.
In the minute 89, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Javi Lopez for Alaves drives towards goal at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adrian Cordero Vega signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Great shot from Real Madrid's Isco but he is denied by the crossbar.
Alaves have a goal kick.
Adrian Cordero Vega blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Adrian Cordero Vega waits before resuming play because Joselu for Alaves is still down.
Joselu, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Deyverson is the substitute for Alaves.
